product.longDescription: Fast-growing and remarkably upright with a very long harvest window. Marketable at many sizes, including mini hearts that are nicely blanched and filled at maturity. Nice crunchy texture. A better pair for Breen and Truchas than Dragoon as it is more closely matched in maturity, shape, and size in all seasons. Stronger mildew package than Dragoon and larger, more upright frame that makes it easier to harvest. High resistance to downy mildew races EU 16–36, US 5–9, Nasonovia ribisnigri aphid, and tomato bushy stunt virus; and intermediate resistance to lettuce mosaic virus. MT0-30. Pelleted seed. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 18,900 seeds/lb. Packet: 250 seeds.
product.shortDescription: Versatile mini romaine with sweet flavor. Organic seed with NOP-compliant pelleting.

Xalbadora Organic Pelleted Lettuce Seed

Product ID:4195GP.114195GP

Fast-growing and remarkably upright with a very long harvest window. Marketable at many sizes, including mini hearts that are nicely blanched and filled at maturity. Nice crunchy texture. A better pair for Breen and Truchas than Dragoon as it is more closely matched in maturity, shape, and size in all seasons. Stronger mildew package than Dragoon and larger, more upright frame that makes it easier to harvest. High resistance to downy mildew races EU 16–36, US 5–9, Nasonovia ribisnigri aphid, and tomato bushy stunt virus; and intermediate resistance to lettuce mosaic virus. MT0-30. Pelleted seed. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 18,900 seeds/lb. Packet: 250 seeds.
